suggestion: "Investigate and address frequent complaints regarding wait times, focusing on staffing levels during peak hours.",
"Improve service quality through additional staff training, emphasizing attentiveness and proactive guest interaction.",
"Implement stricter quality control measures for food preparation, particularly concerning temperature, freshness, and ingredient quality.",
"Evaluate and optimize the ambiance, considering noise levels, temperature, and overall cleanliness to create a more comfortable dining experience.",
"Review portion temperature protocols to ensure consistent delivery of hot food, addressing multiple reports of cold dishes.",
"Conduct a value perception analysis to assess pricing relative to portion size and quality, potentially adjusting menu offerings or pricing strategies.",
